about_the_game:
DLC Bundle Iron Set contains the following items:

A set of metal for forging blades. Includes Ground Metal x15, Dojima Steel x10 and Hihiirogane x5.
*Each purchase only applies once per savedata.
*If inventory is full, free up space and speak to the specter in the cemetery.
